info.name: Create a File-Based Source
info.description: This is to create the configuration for a Self-serve Sources batch connector.

request.description:
Create a Schema for importing Loyalty data into the profile.

Components:
 - XDM Individual Profile (class)
 - Profile person details (mixin; adobe)
 - Profile personal details (mixin; adobe)
 - Loyalty details (mixin; partner)
